titleStmt.title: To JOHN MOSS,John Moss (1800-52), solicitor and Alderman of Derby; he was among those on the platform at the 25th Anniversary Festival of the Derby Mechanics' Institution, scheduled for 8 Oct 1850 (Derby Mercury, 2 Oct 1850, p. 2). Presumably the invitation for CD to attend was forwarded to Moss by the Mayor, James Haywood (see Pilgrim Letters 6, p. 182). 28 SEPTEMBER 1850

body.p: Mr Charles Dickens presents his compliments to Mr Moss, and regrets that his avocations render it quite impossible for him to accept the invitation of the Derby Mechanics' Institution
